mapper.select: SELECT CONTRACTA_CODI AS codeContract, CODI_ITINERARI AS codeItinerary, CODI AS code, DATA_ESDEVENIMENT AS dateEvent, GRUP_ESDEVENIMENT_CODI AS codeGroupEvent, TIPUS_ESDEVENIMENT_CODI AS codeType, ESTAT_VALIDACIO AS stateValidation, MOTIU AS codeReason, SUBMOTIU AS codeSubReason, OBSERVACIONS AS observations, CODI_PREU_AGRUPAT AS codeGroupedPrice, RRMM_CODI AS codeRRMM, PLANTA_DESCARREGA AS codePlantWeighing FROM VW_ESDEVENIMENT WHERE CODI = #{code}
